TopicTitle: NEW MOD REQUEST! Trucks/Truck Platforms or Trailers

Articles.Content:
Hello! I am just a casual KSP player who likes to mess around and build rather horrable crafts . I have been wanting to see a form of trucks and truck bases/trailers to put some things on (in case you are wondering, I am talking about tractor trailer type trucks)(mostly some AA-class things from mods). I was going to attempt to make this mod myself, but I dont have niether the skill or the patience to domods like that, and yes i can say that i have tried!

I was thinking of a base with some attachment nodes for easy attachments and some wheel covers for the stock part wheels to go.

http://youtu.be/GeP5lMNKAVE

If anyone is interested in the idea, let me know! I would really like to see something like this, and if there is already a mod like this, them let me know! thanks-

MNG
SpannerMonkey's made quite a lot of wheels and truck parts
